TEXT.TITLE: CHINA'S WHEAT CROP THREATENED BY PESTS, DISEASE
TEXT.BODY: Pests and disease, which destroyed 1.1 mln tonnes of wheat in China in 1986, are threatening crops on 11.64 mln hectares this year, the China Daily said. About 14.54 mln hectares of wheat were affected in 1986. The paper said abnormal weather conditions had encouraged the spread of wheat midges in 2.47 mln hectares in Shanxi, Henan, Sichuan, Anhui, Hebei and Jiangsu. In Henan, Shandong and Hebei wheat aphids are affecting 4.67 mln hectares, wheat red mite 2.8 mln hectares and wheat powdery mildew 1.7 mln hectares. REUTER
